content.raw:
That did fix the \[…/parameter\_bridge\] error.

Following the instructions on [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup), however, I am still unable to use the joystick to control either X1 or X4, the camera image is not being published, and the RTF is <4%. 

Both `rostopic echo /X1/cmd_vel` and `ign topic -e -t /model/X1/cmd_vel_relay` show nonzero values, but the robot doesn’t move.

The only error is:

```
[Err] [VisibilityTable.cc:57] Unable to populate visibility graph using path[/home/subt-derek/subt_ws/install/share/subt_ign/worlds/tunnel_circuit_practice_03.dot]
[Err] [VisibilityRfModel.cc:36] Unable to load visibility table data files
```
content.html:
That did fix the […/parameter_bridge] error.

Following the instructions on #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup, however, I am still unable to use the joystick to control either X1 or X4, the camera image is not being published, and the RTF is <4%.

Both rostopic echo /X1/cmd_vel and ign topic -e -t /model/X1/cmd_vel_relay show nonzero values, but the robot doesn’t move.

The only error is:

[Err] [VisibilityTable.cc:57] Unable to populate visibility graph using path[/home/subt-derek/subt_ws/install/share/subt_ign/worlds/tunnel_circuit_practice_03.dot]
[Err] [VisibilityRfModel.cc:36] Unable to load visibility table data files
